name: Momo
info:
• 简体中文名: 模模
  • 性别: 雄
  • 引用来源: http://avatar.wikia.com/wiki/Momo
  • 声优: Dee Bradley Baker
detail: Momo was a winged lemur and a loyal companion of Avatar Aang and his friends. He was the only winged lemur known to have survived the Air Nomad Genocide, after which he lived at the Southern Air Temple.
